query:
-- 插入"生肖守护"分类
INSERT INTO categories (id, name, slug, description, parentId, displayOrder, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  6,
  '生肖守护',
  'zodiac-guardian',
  '十二生肖守护吊坠，五台山古法开光加持，守护您的本命运势',
  NULL,
  2,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- 插入"星座守护"分类
INSERT INTO categories (id, name, slug, description, parentId, displayOrder, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  7,
  '星座守护',
  'constellation-guardian',
  '十二星座守护吊坠，融合东方能量仪式与西方星座智慧',
  NULL,
  3,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- 更新生肖商品的分类ID
UPDATE products SET categoryId = 6 WHERE name LIKE '%生肖%' OR name LIKE '%鼠%' OR name LIKE '%牛%' OR name LIKE '%虎%' OR name LIKE '%兔%' OR name LIKE '%龙%' OR name LIKE '%蛇%' OR name LIKE '%马%' OR name LIKE '%羊%' OR name LIKE '%猴%' OR name LIKE '%鸡%' OR name LIKE '%狗%' OR name LIKE '%猪%';

-- 更新星座商品的分类ID
UPDATE products SET categoryId = 7 WHERE name LIKE '%星座%' OR name LIKE '%白羊%' OR name LIKE '%金牛%' OR name LIKE '%双子%' OR name LIKE '%巨蟹%' OR name LIKE '%狮子%' OR name LIKE '%处女%' OR name LIKE '%天秤%' OR name LIKE '%天蝎%' OR name LIKE '%射手%' OR name LIKE '%摩羯%' OR name LIKE '%水瓶%' OR name LIKE '%双鱼%';
